attributes.action: Spend OUR TAX money in the UK First...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By pledging OUR TAX money to all of the foreign problems, Gordon brown is under minding the UK TAX payer. We pay TAX on nearly everything we earn and do, from pensions; to the interest earned in your bank account even recreation is TAXED. This should be spent here in the UK on OUR services first like cleaning our Hospitals to a high standard and protecting OUR Troops before pledging over £100,000,000 to foreign issues.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
